1: A solar flare has destroyed equipment at [destination] which is now in need of replacements. Deliver [cargo].
2: Someone wants to have [cargo] delivered to [destination] as soon as possible.
3: Radiation damage has killed half the population of [destination]. They'd pay good for any [cargo] right now.
4: [destination] has requested as much [cargo] as we can deliver.
5: There is increased need of [cargo] at [destination]. Deliver the goods and return safely!
6: Never underestimate the power of [cargo]! [destination] wants some delivered.
